channel.title: Help! how do you change what npcs say above them?
channel.description:
Hello im kinda new at this nd i need some help im wondering how do you change what npcs say above there head for example an npc says owner zerk how do you change the words it saying please help
thanks :)

item.title: Help! how do you change what npcs say above them?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:1, topic:316108”][quote author=ytpingas link=topic=411928.msg3037546#msg3037546 date=1258866645]
so, basically what your telling us is…

your trying to edit, and leech a server
and when you release it no credits?

npc.config usally…
or npc.cfg
[/quote]
No it doesn’t always work that way…

  1. Open your client file.

  2. Open Class5.java

  3. Search the NPC’s name and change it.

  4. Save.

  5. Compile.

Five easy steps instead of saying

[i]so, basically what your telling us is…

your trying to edit, and leech a server
and when you release it no credits?

npc.config usally…
or npc.cfg[/i]

No Negativity on forums please[/quote]

He means above the head, like plrtext.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! how do you change what npcs say above them?

item.title: Help! how do you change what npcs say above them?
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

Go to npchandler, and type in CTRL+F then type in what they say, push enter. Delete the current text, and change it to yours. HOpe i helped

Read full topic
